To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private IdenticalThreeCrows _identicalthreecrows;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_identicalthreecrows = IdenticalThreeCrows(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_identicalthreecrows.IsReady)
{
    var current = _identicalthreecrows.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.identicalthreecrows = self.IdenticalThreeCrows(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.identicalthreecrows.IsReady:
    current = self.identicalthreecrows.Current.Value
